description:
Want to carry more stuff on your Spider rack? Add one or two of these cradles and you instantly double, or triple, your carrying capacity. Secure them with the same 5mm Allen key used for mounting the rack. The cradle is made for a small dry bag or sleeping back stuff sack, and can be rotated, so you can customize your rack to your gear, or your bike (think dropper post).

  • Works with Aeroe Spider rack, rack can hold up to 3 cradles
  • Integrated straps secure your cargo and have a clean, svelte look
  • Cradle can be mounted inline with the frame or rotated up to 90° (with a 5mm Allen key)
  • Constructed from stainless steel, anodized aluminium, glass reinforced nylon and silicone coated straps
  • Load capacity 4kg
name: Aeroe Spider Rear Cradle
